questions.question: What is your company name?
questions.description: Replaces the {{Company Name}} placeholder throughout the document

questions.question: What is the version number for this document?
When does this training framework become effective?
questions.description: Sets the effective date for the training program

questions.question: When was this document last reviewed?
questions.description: Tracks when the document was last reviewed

questions.question: Who is the approver for this document?
questions.description: Person who approved this training framework

questions.question: What training delivery methods does your organization use?
questions.description: Define how training is delivered in your organization

questions.question: What metrics will you use to measure training success?
questions.description: Define how you will measure the effectiveness of your training programs

questions.question: What specific training programs does your organization offer?
questions.placeholder: List each training program, one per line
questions.description: Customize the scope section with your specific training programs

questions.question: What training activities are out of scope for this framework?
questions.placeholder: List activities not covered by this framework
questions.description: Define what training activities are excluded from this framework

questions.question: What departments are responsible for training in your organization?
questions.description: Customize department names responsible for training

questions.question: What are the specific role titles involved in training?
questions.description: Define the actual role titles in your organization

questions.question: Describe your company-specific training procedures
questions.placeholder: Detail your training planning, development, execution, and evaluation procedures
questions.description: Customize the training planning process for your organization

questions.question: What criteria do you use to evaluate training effectiveness?
questions.description: Define how you evaluate and improve training programs

questions.question: What are your company-specific KPIs for training?
questions.placeholder: List key performance indicators for training success
questions.description: Define specific KPIs that align with your business goals

questions.question: What constitutes success for your training programs?
questions.placeholder: Define what successful training looks like in your organization
questions.description: Set clear success criteria for training initiatives

questions.question: What tools or systems do you use to measure training effectiveness?
questions.placeholder: LMS, surveys, performance management systems, etc.
questions.description: Specify the tools used to track and measure training metrics
